articles.description: McLaren’s Lando Norris says he is “still hopeful” of a good result in Sunday’s Azerbaijan Grand Prix despite starting the race in 16th place.
articles.title: Azerbaijan GP: Lando Norris 'still hopeful' of good result

articles.description: Europe win Saturday's final two points to keep alive their hopes of lifting a record fourth successive Solheim Cup.
articles.title: Solheim Cup 2024: US retain four-point lead as Europe show fight in Virginia

articles.description: "A setback" is how Arne Slot describes his first defeat as Liverpool manager, while pundit Chris Sutton declares "the honeymoon is over".
articles.title: Liverpool 0-1 Nottingham Forest: 'Honeymoon' over as Arne Slot rues 'setback'

articles.description: Aston Villa striker Jhon Duran must have read a piece on the BBC Sport website this week headlined 'The slow death of the screamer' - and decided to take matters into his own hands.
articles.title: Aston Villa 3-2 Everton: Jhon Duran scores 'unstoppable' winner

articles.description: Great Britain's Daryll Neita finishes second behind American Brittany Brown in the women's 200m at the Diamond League season finale in Brussels.
articles.title: Diamond League final: GB's Daryll Neita second in 200m in Brussels

articles.title: Holstein Kiel vs Bayern München: Bundesliga - BBC Sport

articles.description: Rory McIlroy's dream of lifting the Irish Open trophy in his home county remains alive as he takes a one-shot cushion heading into the final day at Royal County Down.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy: World number takes one-shot lead into Irish Open final round

articles.description: Substitute Christopher Nkunku nets a late goal to snatch a 1-0 away win for Chelsea despite a dominant attacking display from Bournemouth.
articles.title: Late Nkunku goal earns Chelsea win at Bournemouth

articles.description: The death, after being set ablaze, of marathon runner Rebecca Chepetegei shocked the world.
articles.title: Rebecca Cheptegei funeral: Olympic marathon runner killed by ex-boyfriend buried
